Overview Chapter

class CGOBWidget

Constructors and Destructors
CGOBWidgetSet default information.
~CGOBWidgetFree up allocated memory.
Operations
CreateSprites
GetBltType Get the CDX blitting type.
GetFontIndexToUse
GetID Get this widgets event ID.
GetImagePtr Get the CDXSprite pointer for this widget.
GetParent Get a WidgetParent pointer to the parent of this widget.
GetTextColor
GetTextShadowColor
GetToolTipText Return the tooltip text associated with this widget.
IsFlagSet Checks if flag is set using Logical AND to check flag.
RemoveFlag Remove flags.
SetBltType Set the CDX blitting type.
SetFlag Set flags.
SetFontIndexToUse
SetID Set this widgets event ID.
SetParent Sets this widgets parent.
SetPos Initialization position and size calls.
SetSize
SetTextColor Text specific stuff.
SetTextShadowColor
SetTextShadowOffset
SetToolTipText Set the tooltip text for this widget.
Initialize Initialize internals.
Overridables
BringToFrontBring this widget to the front of the drawing/processing list.
FindMouseObjectSee if mouse is on this widget.
GetTextGet the text associated with this widget.
MoveMoves widget to new position and all children widgets with parent.
SetTextChange the text associated with this widget Allocation of text is internal to widget.
Data Members
public
BOOL HitEnterKey;Flag used to check if enter key was hit. (NOT USED).
BOOL IsDisabled;Flag used to check if widget is disabled. (SHOULD BE CHANGED TO USE FLAGS).
POINT m_Pos;Widget position.
SIZE m_Size;Widget size.
DWORD m_dwFlags;
protected
WORD m_BltType;CDX Blitting method.
char m_FontIndex;Index of font into managers font table.
INT16 m_ID;Up to 32768 for ID. Used to set events from actions.
DWORD m_TextColor;Color of text.
POINT m_TextShadow;Shadow offset for text.
DWORD m_TextShadowColor;Color of shadow.
CDXSprite* m_pImage;CDXSprite image pointer.
CGOBWidgetParent* m_pParent;The parent widget if there is one.
char* m_pText;Text specific miscellaneous text associated with this widget.
char* m_pToolTipText;
SIZE m_szText;Dimensions of text using current font.
